mapper.select: select * from search where (pum_name = #{searchName} or good_name =#{searchName}) and sale_date = (select max(sale_date) from search) order by good_name limit #{pageRequest.limit} offset #{pageRequest.offset}
mapper.insert: insert into search(avg_amt, flower_gubn, good_name, lv, max_amt, min_amt, pum_name, sale_date, created_at, modified_at) values (#{avgAmt}, #{flowerGubn}, #{goodName}, #{lv}, #{maxAmt}, #{minAmt}, #{pumName}, #{saleDate}, sysdate(), sysdate())
mapper.delete: delete from search where date(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)) > date(created_at)
mapper.select: select count(1) as total from search where (pum_name = #{searchName} or good_name =#{searchName}) and sale_date = (select max(sale_date) from search) order by good_name
